bill_title: void covenants that prohibit or restrict the possession or use of firearms and ammunition.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to void covenants that prohibit or restrict the possession or use of firearms and ammunition. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added to chapter 43-12: A covenant running with the land may not prohibit, restrict, or have the effect of prohibiting or restricting: (1) The lawful possession, storing, or transportation of a firearm, any part of a firearm, or ammunition; or (2) The lawful discharge of a firearm. Any covenant in violation of this section, including one enacted before July 1, 2024, is void and unenforceable.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
